title: Task-Oriented Project-Based Learning for Mathematical Discourse Transformation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and fundamental concepts of negative numbers
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals in social sectors requiring mathematical communication to integrate new mathematical concepts (e.g., negative numbers) with existing knowledge for practical application.

learning_goals: Learners can solve multiplication problems involving negative numbers by applying them to real-life scenarios (e.g., financial/ temperature calculations)
Learners can compare and explain differences between traditional and emerging mathematical discourse
Learners can creatively propose solutions to conflicts arising during discourse transition processes through project collaboration

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
